title: How to merge two songs into one - Quora

response.answer_text: Without knowing what machine you are on, I will offer up an online option: 1. Online – Apowersoft (Free) Apowersoft Free Online Audio Editor is an online tool which specially designed for editing audio with the help of internet connection fast and easily. This tool will let you merge MP3 online and you can export in formats including MP3, OGG, WAV, AAC, FLAC, M4A, etc. In this case, you can merge and edit audio using it within just a few clicks. Visit the page of ApowersoftOn the page, click “Launch Application” button and then “Download Launcher.” The launcher is only required to download first time when using the tool.Click “Please load an audio file” tab, browse your folders and import the file that you want to edit.Next, click on “Tools” – “Append audio files” to insert another audio right after the first file. Repeat this step, you can merge more files into one.You may save the newly created file by clicking the “Export” icon on the lower part of the interface. Choose the format, quality, and the folder where you want it to place the audio.
